name: King Of The Titans
description:
A third-person platformer where you play as Cronus, you must find your way out of Tartarus through puzzles and platforms until you reach Uranus (Heaven & Cronus’ father). Here you must defeat him and take the throne of the universe and title, “King of The Titans”.

I made this for the Mini Jam 112 themed Chrono so I hope you enjoy the game! I'm not a programmer so the mechanics might be a little shoddy but I am a level designer so this gave me a great opportunity to try out some actual level design methods :)

All music and sound FX credits are in game :)
